NG0300:2: badzra ki la sarba ng+harma gu+u h+ya r+tha ng+ha tu+u dz+nya na dwa ya tan+t+ra ra dza na' ma /
NG0300:4: rdo rje phur pa'i chos thams cad kyi gsang ba'i
NG0300:5: don dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i rgyud
NG0300:6: kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba /
NG0300:9: [(]16[)]@#// chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
NG0300:10: 'di ltar sangs rgyas pa'i dus na /
NG0300:11: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
NG0300:12: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs
NG0300:13: pa rgyal ba kun gyi gtso bo /
NG0300:14: rigs thams cad kyi bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings ye shes kyi sku gnyis su med pa /
NG0300:15: bde ba chen po mya ngan las 'das pa /
NG0300:16: ma skyes yongs su grub pa'i sku /
NG0300:18: 'gag pa med cing rol pa chen po'i sku /
NG0300:19: snang la rang bzhin med pa'i tshul gyis /
NG0300:22: mkha' dbyings rnam par dag pa'i gzhal yas khang */
NG0300:23: dpag cing gzhal ba las 'das pa /
NG0300:24: gnas kyi mchog / mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang */
NG0300:25: dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i khyad par las /
NG0300:26: skye ba dang 'gag pa'i tshul gyis /
NG0300:27: ye shes la ye shes rol pa dang */
NG0300:28: chos nyid la chos nyid rol pa dang */
NG0300:29: sku skye ba med pa dang */
NG0300:31: thugs mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'bum phrag mang po dang */
NG0300:32: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang gsal ba rtog pa med pa dang */
NG0300:33: gnyis su med par mnyam pa nyid dang */
NG0300:34: ma 'dres pa so sor rtog pa dang */
NG0300:35: dmigs su med pa'i thugs rje dang */
NG0300:37: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang */
NG0300:40: stong pa nyid kyi sgo dang snang ba gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis thabs cig tu bzhugs so //
NG0300:41: de'i tshe rig pa'i ye shes kyis /
NG0300:42: chos kyi sku la bskul ba ni /
NG0300:44: ma skyes gdod nas dag pa chos kyi sku //
NG0300:45: ma nor ma bcos chos dbyings spros dang bral //
NG0300:46: brdal ba chen pos yongs la rang bzhin gnas //
NG0300:47: de nyid ma rtogs ma rig 'khor ba las //
NG0300:48: thabs mkhas thugs rje chen pos bstan du gsol //
NG0300:49: zhes pa'i tshul gyis zhus pas /
NG0300:50: chos kyi sku las rang byung du gsungs pa /
NG0300:51: e ma ye nas sangs rgyas ka dag rang bzhin kyang *//
NG0300:52: 'on kyang ma rig rtog pa'i blo 'khrul pas //
NG0300:53: gzung 'dzin log rtog sdug bsngal 'khyams pa las //
NG0300:54: ye dag ye grol ye sangs rgyas pa'i don //
NG0300:55: ma rtog blo la brjod med don nyid bstan //
NG0300:57: phur pa gsang ba don gyi rgyud las /
NG0300:58: gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o ///
NG0300:59: / de nas rig pa'i ye shes kyis /
NG0300:60: chos kyi dbyings la bskul ba 'di lta ste //
NG0300:61: ye nas ma bcos lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang *//
NG0300:62: 'jig rten khams kun ye nas dag pa'i gnas //
NG0300:63: bzang ngan gnyis med dus shes rtogs pa'o //
NG0300:64: sems nyid yid bzhin dgos 'dod sna tshogs 'byung *//
NG0300:65: rnam shes sna tshogs ye shes rtogs pa'i 'khor //
NG0300:66: bdag nyid sangs rgyas snang la rang bzhin med //
NG0300:67: bsod nams ye shes tshogs kyang rdzogs par rol //
NG0300:68: kun tu bzang po'i mchod sprin sna tshogs rol //
NG0300:70: ba de nyid sems las byung *//
NG0300:71: mi rtog ye shes rnam rtog bgegs rnams sel //
NG0300:72: chos kun rang bzhin rnam dag 'od gsal dang *//
NG0300:73: chos rnams thams cad ye nas stong zhing dben //
NG0300:74: ngang ngam shugs kyis rang bzhin thugs rje 'byung *//
NG0300:75: sems nyid skye med cho 'phrul yi ger shar //
NG0300:76: 'byung ba lnga ni chos nyid yum gyi mkha' //
NG0300:77: nyon mongs lnga dag ye shes lnga ldan zhing *//
NG0300:78: srid pa gsum ston rdo rje phur pa'i lha //
NG0300:79: ye shes khro bo ngang dang shugs las grub //
NG0300:80: gnyis med tshul gyis ma gshegs srid par byon //
NG0300:81: bla med dbyings kyi ngang du ro gcig thim //
NG0300:82: chos nyid bde chen skye med brjod dang bral //
NG0300:83: thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro kun dbyings su sdud //
NG0300:84: ma brtags bzhin du ye nas lhun gyi grub //
NG0300:85: kun bzhi rnam shes 'og min gnas su sbyor //
NG0300:86: de tshe khams gsum 'khor ba'i gnas las bsgral /
NG0300:87: de ltar don shes rig cing rtogs pa'i tshe //
NG0300:88: sku gsung thugs kyi sa la nges par phyin //
NG0300:89: phur pa gsang ba don rgyud las /
NG0300:90: ye nas rang bzhin gnas pa'i le'u+u ste gnyis pa'o ///
NG0300:91: / de nas rig pa ye shes kyis //
NG0300:92: chos kyi dbyings la bskul ba las //
NG0300:93: chos nyid ngang las rang sgrar shar ba'o //
NG0300:95: rang bzhin skye ba med pa'i chos nyid la //
NG0300:96: tshig dang yi ger bstan med brjod dang bral /
NG0300:97: skye med chos de sna tshogs ston par byed //
NG0300:98: brjod med de nyid rjod pa kun gyi mchog / tshig kun gsal byed ye shes las byung ba //
NG0300:99: byin gyis rlabs kyis rab tu rtogs par byed //
NG0300:100: dngos po'i chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis stong *//
NG0300:101: stong pa ma yin sems kyi snang bar shar //
NG0300:102: de la rang bzhin med de chu zla bzhin //
NG0300:103: snang stong gnyis med lta ba rnam par dag /
NG0300:104: rang bzhin 'od gsal nyon mongs ngang gi dag /
NG0300:105: spros pa'i mtha' bral rnam pa yongs cir min //
NG0300:106: rig pa 'gag med sna tshogs rol pa che //
NG0300:107: gzung 'dzin rnam rtog sdug bsngal dbyings su shar //
NG0300:108: de la mtshan ma'i skyon gyis ma gos par //
NG0300:109: sgro skur bral ba'i ye shes chen po ste //
NG0300:110: lhun gyis grub pa'i bde chen kun spyod kyang *//
NG0300:111: log rtog 'khrul pa'i dbang gis so sor shar //
NG0300:112: ma rig log rtog de nyid gnas su dag / gnyis med chos sku mi rtog ye shes yin //
NG0300:113: rig 'dzin skal pa can gyis rtogs par 'gyur //
NG0300:114: de ni sangs rgyas kun dang dgongs pa mnyam //
NG0300:115: rgyun gyi khyad par gyis kyang 'phags pa yin //
NG0300:116: don dam phur pa'i rang bzhin byang chub sems //
NG0300:117: ngo bo chos sku skye med rnam par dag / mtshan nyid gnyis med bde chen zug rngu zhi //
NG0300:118: nges tshig dag pa'i mgo phur kun las dpa' //
NG0300:119: dbye na don dam rnam grangs ma yin dang *//
NG0300:120: dbyings dang ye shes chos nyid chos kyi sku //
NG0300:121: skye med bde chen ma skyes dmigs med bral //
NG0300:122: ye nyid ji bzhin zab pa yang dag don //
NG0300:126: phur pa gsang ba'i don rgyud las /
NG0300:127: de kho na nyid gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste
NG0300:128: gsum pa'o // // de nas yang rig pa'i ye
NG0300:129: shes kyis / chos kyis dbyings la bskul ba rang byung 'di skad do //
NG0300:130: thog mar shes rab gsum la blo sbyangs pas //
NG0300:131: spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid dbab pa dang *//
NG0300:132: blta ba'i sgro 'dogs bcad cing la bzlas te //
NG0300:133: ting 'dzin nyams kyi drod tshad shugs las 'byung *//
NG0300:134: byang chub sems kyi don la 'dris par bya //
NG0300:135: mnyam pa nyid kyi don la blo bzhag ste //
NG0300:136: gzung 'dzin bag chags mtshan ma dag par bya //
NG0300:137: dngos po thams cad mi rtog zil gyis mnan //
NG0300:138: nyon mongs kun kyang dbang du bya zhing blang *//
NG0300:139: bsgom du med pa'i don nyid rtogs par bya //
NG0300:140: yang na sangs rgyas dgongs pa rnal du dbab //
NG0300:141: mnyam nyid ngang la dus gsum rgyun du gnas //
NG0300:142: phyi rol yul gyi zhen pa bcad byas la //
NG0300:143: don dam skye med chos kyi dbyings su bsgom //
NG0300:144: chos nyid rig pa'i ye shes dag la ni //
NG0300:145: shes pa sangs stongs ji bzhin je gsal bsgom //
NG0300:146: rnam par mi rtog ye nas skye med las //
NG0300:147: skye ba'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs cir yang shar //
NG0300:148: cir yang ma yin cir snang chos kyi sku //
NG0300:149: stong nyid snang ba snang ba stong pa nyid //
NG0300:150: so so ma yin tha dad med par bslab //
NG0300:151: nyams blang tshe na lus ngag bcos su med //
NG0300:152: sems nyid nam mkha' 'dra ste rnam rtog bral //
NG0300:153: rtogs pa'i gdeng ldan chos nyid gtan la dbab //
NG0300:154: gdod nas ma skyes chos kyi dbyings su dag / rig pa byang chub sems nyid rtogs nas kyang *//
NG0300:155: rang bzhin ma skyes yongs su grub pa'i sku //
NG0300:156: snang la rang bzhin med pa 'ja' tshon 'dra //
NG0300:157: chu zla lta bu'i sangs rgyas 'od dang ldan //
NG0300:158: thugs kar dpal be'u yi ge 'bru dgu ni //
NG0300:159: gser la 'phra bkod bzhin du gsal bsgoms te //
NG0300:160: rdzogs pa'i rim pa gdams ngag tshul bzhin bsgom //
NG0300:161: rgod na skye med rmugs na chos nyid la //
NG0300:162: 'phro na bde chen bying na khro bo ste //
NG0300:163: ye shes lnga yi bsnyen pa'i ting nge 'dzin //
NG0300:164: 'dzab kyi dgongs pa chu bo'i rgyun bzhin no //
NG0300:165: chos nyid ngang las sngags kyi sgra dbyangs blang *//
NG0300:166: sems 'dzin bsam gtan ting 'dzin ma yengs bsgom //
NG0300:167: dbyings kyi ngang las rang byung rang grags bsam //
NG0300:168: de tshe rnam rtog dgra chen thams cad kun //
NG0300:169: gzung 'dzin mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su phur //
NG0300:170: gdeng ldan rnal 'byor nyes pas ma gos pas //
NG0300:171: snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig bsad bcad pa //
NG0300:172: zhe sdang rang rgyud sems kyis ma yin te //
NG0300:173: byams dang snying rje ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
NG0300:174: rtogs pa klong du gyur pas dbyings su sgrol //
NG0300:175: ting 'dzin drod tshad las su rung gyur na //
NG0300:176: nam yang nyes pa'i skyon gyis gos mi 'gyur //
NG0300:177: sgrol bar rang rgyud las kyi srin por skyes //
NG0300:179: pas dmyal khams bco brgyad du //
NG0300:180: bskal pa grangs med gsum du sdug bsngal myong *//
NG0300:181: de bas rnal 'byor phal gyis byar mi rung *//
NG0300:182: phur pa gsang ba don rgyud las /
NG0300:183: ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o ///
NG0300:184: / de nas bcom ldan 'das chos dbyings dam pa'i sku la rig ye shes kyis bskul ba /
NG0300:185: rang byung ba ni 'di lta ste /
NG0300:186: chos nyid mya ngan 'das pa phur pa'i don //
NG0300:187: rgyu 'bras gnyis las 'das pa'i byang chub sems //
NG0300:188: don dam chos nyid rang byung phur pa ni //
NG0300:189: phur ni chos dbyings pa ni mya ngan 'das //
NG0300:190: phur ni ye shes pa nyid byang chub sems //
NG0300:191: thugs rje chen po'i phur pa bla ma'i don //
NG0300:192: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid sems kyi mtshan nyid yin //
NG0300:193: rgyud kyi rgyal po lung gi bla med pa //
NG0300:194: man ngag nges pa'i ngo bo kun dang bral //
NG0300:195: don dam brjod med blta ru med pa yin //
NG0300:196: skye dang 'gag med gzung dang 'dzin pa med //
NG0300:197: gsal la 'grib med 'pho 'gyur med pa'i don //
NG0300:198: mtha' bral sgro skur 'khor 'das gnyis su med //
NG0300:199: snang stong dbyer med tha dad med pa'i don //
NG0300:200: theb shor med cing gsal la rnam rtog bral //
NG0300:201: chos kyi dbyings kyis gzung 'dzin gnyis la gdab //
NG0300:202: mya ngan 'das pas 'khor ba'i chos la gdab //
NG0300:203: ye shes chen pos mnyam pa nyid la gdab //
NG0300:204: byang chub sems kyis shes rab thabs la gdab //
NG0300:205: thugs rje'i phur pa 'gro drug kun la gdab //
NG0300:206: bla ma chen pos snod dang don la gdab //
NG0300:207: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid rnam par rtog la gdab //
NG0300:208: sems kyi sems nyid rtogs pa'i blo la'o //
NG0300:209: dbyings la btab pas don rnams rdzogs par byed //
NG0300:210: sems la btab pas rig pa'i ye shes shar //
NG0300:211: chos nyid mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings su gdab //
NG0300:212: de lta'i don gyis theb pa gyur pa'i tshe //
NG0300:213: 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid mya ngan 'das par bzla //
NG0300:214: sdug bsngal de nyid chos nyid byang chub sems //
NG0300:215: rnam rtog las ni ye shes skye 'gyur zhing *//
NG0300:216: dmyal ba'i gnas nyid 'og min bla med gnas //
NG0300:217: de tshe ma lus phur pa gdab ces bya //
NG0300:218: don dam nges par gyur pa lta ba yin //
NG0300:219: gsal ba rnam rtog bral ba bsgoms pa yin //
NG0300:220: bya bral tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa 'bras bu yin //
NG0300:221: zhen chags 'dzin pa med pa spyod pa yin //
NG0300:222: 'khor 'das gnyis su med na sbyor ba yin //
NG0300:223: thugs rje'i gzungs kyis 'dzin na sgrol ba yin //
NG0300:224: don gnyis lhangs kyis rtogs na theb pa yin //
NG0300:225: gang du mi rtog 'dzin pa dam tshig yin //
NG0300:226: theb shor med pa'i don rtogs man ngag yin //
NG0300:227: mngon du gyur na mngon sum dkyil 'khor yin //
NG0300:228: don gnyis nyams su lon na ting 'dzin yin //
NG0300:229: gnas su bstab pa mchod pa chen po yin //
NG0300:230: byar med lhun gyis grub pa phrin las yin //
NG0300:231: rig pa gdeng du gyur pa dbang mchog ste //
NG0300:232: des na thams cad ma lus phur pa'i @#//
NG0300:234: phur ni skye med pa ni 'gag pa med //
NG0300:235: phur ni gzung med pa ni 'dzin med don //
NG0300:236: phur ni ye shes pa ni chos kyi dbyings //
NG0300:237: phur ni thabs chen rdo rje yab kyis mkha' //
NG0300:238: pa ni shes rab pha rol phyin ma yum gyi klong *//
NG0300:239: chos nyid dbyer med phur pa'i don gnyis kyis //
NG0300:240: mnyam pa'i rgyal pos thams cad dbyings su bsgral //
NG0300:241: stong gsum 'jig rten khams kun bsgral ba'i zhing *//
NG0300:242: bsgral bya sgrol byed chos nyid gnyis su med //
NG0300:243: de yi don ni rang byung phur pa'i don //
NG0300:245: phur pa gsang ba don gyi rgyud las /
NG0300:246: rang byung phur pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o ///
